document_notes.text:
This update for expat fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-23852: Fixed signed integer overflow in XML_GetBuffer (bsc#1195054).
- CVE-2022-23990: Fixed integer overflow in the doProlog function (bsc#1195217).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.4 has a signed integer overflow in XML_GetBuffer, for configurations with a nonzero XML_CONTEXT_BYTES.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
